[windows] skip # Does not have Unix-style directory permissions.
[plan9] skip   # Might not have Unix-style directory permissions.

# Make the directory ./noread unreadable, and verify that 'go work use -r .'
# reports a permission error
# for https://github.com/golang/go/issues/51960

chmod 000 noread

! go work use -r .
stderr '^go: open noread: permission denied$'

cmp go.work go.work_want

-- noread/go.mod --
module example.com
go 1.18
-- go.work --
go 1.18
-- go.work_want --
go 1.18
